SEARCH
Package Game.Gun

Class Weapon

java.lang.Object
Game.Gun.Weapon
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBehaviour
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bomb, Gun
public abstract class Weapon extends Object implements IBehaviour
Abstract base class for all weapons. Handles rotation, firing logic, and attachment to a game object.

    • Weapon

      public Weapon(IGameObject owner, String name, double damage, double fireRate, double distanceFromOwner)
      Constructor for a weapon.
      Parameters:
      owner - the owning game object
      name - weapon name
      damage - weapon damage
      fireRate - shots per second
      distanceFromOwner - distance from owner to orbit

      Parameters:
      mousePosition - the mouse position in world coordinates

    • shoot

      public boolean shoot()
      Attempts to shoot the weapon.
      Returns:
      true if the weapon fired, false if still on cooldown or not initialized
